QueryViewSpec.Name: Photo Update Correspondents Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Correspondents who sponsor a child with a completed Annual Photo Update interaction
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select s.CONSTITUENTID as ID, c.LOOKUPID as SPONSORLOOKUPID, c.NAME as SPONSORNAME, so.ID as CHILDID, proj_const.LOOKUPID as PROJECTLOOKUPID, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME as CHILDNAME
from SPONSORSHIP s inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on s.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = so_child.ID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = slocation.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT proj_const on proj_const.ID = slocation.FIELDOFFICEID
where s.STATUSCODE = 1 -- Active and exists (select i.ID from dbo.INTERACTION i join dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY isubcat on i.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = isubcat.ID join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY icat on isubcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = icat.ID where i.CONSTITUENTID = so_child.CONSTITUENTID and isubcat.NAME = 'Annual Photo Update' and icat.NAME = 'Child Annual Update' and year(i.EXPECTEDDATE) = year(getdate()) and i.STATUSCODE = 2 -- Completed )
